statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ -8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 4 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 26 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ -8 \\ -7 \\ 6 \\ -56 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
